name: Lets Glow It: Rolly Ball Jump
name_original: Lets Glow It: Rolly Ball Jump
description:
Glow It: Small glow ball dash is a speed and passion with the magic of click. A glowing ball waiting for the tap to dash, stop the magic of the click, point dash to dash. So get control of your rolling ball to be a rolly ball challenger!

> Jump through space farther, unlock more challenging levels, create new records.

> Hit the balls game - You dare to challenge 1000 scores?

> The higher you get, the harder the landing will be! Don't crash and keep it smooth!

> Tap the screen to fire the ball. Travel through the lights. Be amazing!

> Prepare your fingers & your reflexes! Glow It will test your awesome skills till you lose!
